headline.0: Stop the Next Iraq War Before It Starts
headline.1: The Party and the Army: Civil-Military Relations in Cuba

short_description.0: President Obama has promised not to send "combat troops" to Iraq, but it's hard to see how the U.S. military personnel he is sending there can avoid combat, given that they are being dropped into the middle of a civil war.
short_description.1: Today, eight ministries are led by career military officers, three of whom are still on active duty.

authors.0: William Hartung, ContributorWriter and Foreign Policy Expert
authors.1: William M. LeoGrande, ContributorProfessor at American University in Washington, D.C.
